groups.name: spring.db-queue.config
groups.description: Configuration for a specific queue, defined by the queue name.

properties.name: spring.db-queue.enabled
properties.description: Flag if Yandex.Money DB Queue auto configuration is enabled.

properties.name: spring.db-queue.create-schema
properties.description: Flag if schema should be created automatically in a database. Database type determined by the database dialect.

properties.name: spring.db-queue.dialect
properties.description: Database dialect used for the queue.

properties.name: spring.db-queue.config.location
properties.description: Queue location (name of the table) in the database.
